title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\ContainerPort
name: ContainerPort
description:
ContainerPort represents a network port in a single container.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.ContainerPort

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: If specified, used to specify which protocol to use. Allowed values are "http1" and "h2c".

params.name: data.container_port
params.description: Port number the container listens on. This must be a valid TCP port number, 0 < container_port < 65536.
